0.speaker: Warrior Yr'rk
0.text: On second thoughts, perhaps an inquisitive istik would make a good practice dummy.
0.context: NodeContext: with a touch of fear/trying to will themselves to believe it (W'wargaz isn't easily impressed)

1.speaker: Warrior Yr'rk
1.text: Inquisitor W'wargaz will surely be satisfied with today's training session. Surely.
1.context: NodeContext: with a touch of fear/trying to will themselves to believe it (W'wargaz isn't easily impressed)

2.speaker: Warrior Yr'rk
2.text: The sa'varsh is running even stricter drills than usual for the yanki. Glad I passed that mark already.
2.context: NodeContext: "sa-var-sh" meaning teacher/drill sergeant, yank meaning children

3.speaker: Warrior Yr'rk
3.text: The yanki are distracted enough; they don't need your interference.
